titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Child or Young Person (Community Services) - Description

div.p: A Child or Young Person (Community Services) is a PERSON.

For the purpose of the Community Services Data Set, this relates to all Children or Young People from birth up to the day before their 19th birthday, with the exception of young adults who remain in paediatric services after their 19th birthday and are included until their transition to adult services is completed.
